summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning within the Roosevelt Residential Urban Village, changing the zoning designations of certain lands, establishing a new Station Area Overlay District, expanding an existing pedestrian zoning designation, modifying certain general locational criteria for single family zones, and amending sections: 23.34.010 and amending the Official Land Use Map, Chapter 23.32, at pages 43 and 60 to rezone areas within the Roosevelt Residential Urban Village.
note: This Council Bill was replaced by [Ordinance 123816](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=&s4=123816&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=1&f=G), passed by the Full Council on January 30, 2012.
